abstract: Joseph M Hunter, former Army sergeant with nickname Rambo, pleads guilty to murder plot targeting a federal drug agent, in what federal officials say was Hunter's post-military role as contract killer; Hunter is also charged with conspiring to import cocaine into the United States.
lead_paragraph: Joseph M. Hunter, 49, and two other men had agreed to kill an agent of the United States Drug Enforcement Administration and an informant for $800,000.

headline.main: Former Army Sniper Pleads Guilty in Murder-for-Hire Conspiracy
headline.print_headline: Former Army Sniper Pleads Guilty in Murder-for-Hire Conspiracy

snippet: Joseph M. Hunter, 49, and two other men had agreed to kill an agent of the United States Drug Enforcement Administration and an informant for $800,000.
